member.name: IMFSinkWriterCallback2.OnStreamError
member.summary: Called when an asynchronous error occurs with the .
member.param: The index of the stream of the transform that raised the asynchronous error.
member.returns: Returns an HRESULT value. Currently, the sink writer ignores the return value.

member.name: IMFSinkWriterCallback2.OnTransformChange
member.summary: Called when the transform chain in the is built or modified.
member.returns: Returns an HRESULT value. Currently, the sink writer ignores the return value.
